textPlain: Some of the more recent numbers for the bigger bubble countries- US June deficit narrowed 16% to 60 billion.  deficit with China dropped 30% to 9.5 billion, lowest deficit in 21 years, since February 2004.  Now US expects 50 billion per month in tariffs revenue.- China's trade surplus in June rose to 683 billion, exports to the United States sank nearly 22% year-on-year, exports to Africa and Southeast Asia surged at double-digit rates as Chinese businesses diverted sales to other markets.  Chinese industrial profits however, plunged 10% in may 2025.
